title: How to install Google Chrome browser on my laptop - Quora

response.answer_text: How do I install Google Chrome browser on my laptop? It is fairly easy to install. Open your default browser and go to this address: Google Chrome - The New Chrome & Most Secure Web Browser There should be a button to install, click it and let it do its thing. There is also a stand alone installer you can download, the links can be found on this page: How to download Google Chrome Offline Installer setup for Windows PC
